attributes.action: resign as prime minister and to close down the labour party so it can never detroy our country again
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Labour is full of criminals.
and labour is never to be trusted.

now the second can be said of all government parties but those two sentences will always be remebered by me.
now this government has proved time and time again that it is in no fit state to run a country like england, and it should of never been given the chance.
its creating a english society of layabouts and scroungers.
every problem you see wrong with this country you can and should blame on labour.
they were tasked to ran this country and they failed mightily.
so its time we helped ourselves and our children and removed labour, either peacibly or by force.
